12  JointControl::JointControl(const uint32_t jointId,QWidget* parent ) :
13  m_GroupBox(this),
14  m_JointId(jointId),
15  m_PositionLabel(&m_GroupBox),
16  m_VelocityLabel(&m_GroupBox),
17  m_VelocitySlider(Qt::Horizontal,&m_GroupBox),
18  m_StopButton(&m_GroupBox),
19  m_bIsReferenced(false)
20  {
21  InitializeROS();
22  InitializeState();
23  InitializeUI();
24  }
25 
27  void JointControl::InitializeUI()
28  {
29  m_GroupLayout.addRow(tr("Position:"),&m_PositionLabel);
30  m_GroupLayout.addRow(tr("Velocity:"),&m_VelocityLabel);
31  m_GroupLayout.addRow(&m_VelocitySlider);
32  m_GroupLayout.addRow(&m_StopButton);
33  m_StopButton.setText(tr("STOP"));
34  m_VelocitySlider.setMinimum(-100);
35  m_VelocitySlider.setMaximum(100);
36  m_VelocitySlider.setTickInterval(100);
37  m_VelocitySlider.setTickPosition(QSlider::TicksBelow);
38  m_GroupBox.setLayout(&m_GroupLayout);
39  m_GroupBox.setTitle((m_JointName+":").c_str());
40  m_MainLayout.addWidget(&m_GroupBox);
41  setLayout(&m_MainLayout);
42  OnPositionChanged();
43  OnVelocityChanged();
44  Disable();
45  connect(&m_VelocitySlider,&QAbstractSlider::valueChanged,this,&JointControl::OnVelocitySliderValueChanged);
46  connect(&m_StopButton,&QAbstractButton::clicked,this,&JointControl::OnStopButtonClicked);
47  }
48 
51  void JointControl::set_IsReferenced(const bool bReferenced)
52  {
53  if(m_bIsReferenced!=bReferenced)
54  {
55  m_bIsReferenced=bReferenced;
56  OnPositionChanged();
57  }
58  }
59 
62  bool JointControl::get_Referenced() const
63  {
64  return m_bIsReferenced;
65  }
66 
68  void JointControl::Enable()
69  {
70  m_VelocitySlider.setValue(0);
71  m_VelocitySlider.setEnabled(true);
72  m_StopButton.setEnabled(true);
73  }
74 
76  void JointControl::Disable()
77  {
78  m_VelocitySlider.setValue(0);
79  m_VelocitySlider.setEnabled(false);
80  m_StopButton.setEnabled(false);
81  }
82 
84  void JointControl::OnStopButtonClicked(bool checked)
85  {
86  m_VelocitySlider.setValue(0);
87  }
88 
90  void JointControl::OnVelocityChanged()
91  {
92  std::stringstream sstr;
93  sstr << ::std::fixed << std::setprecision(1) << (180.0*m_Velocity/M_PI) << " °/s";
94  m_VelocityLabel.setText(sstr.str().c_str());
95  }
96 
98  void JointControl::OnPositionChanged()
99  {
100  std::stringstream sstr;
101  sstr << ::std::fixed << std::setprecision(1) << (180.0*m_Position/M_PI) << " °";
102  if(!m_bIsReferenced)
103  sstr << " (unreferenced)";
104  m_PositionLabel.setText(sstr.str().c_str());
105  }
106 
108  void JointControl::InitializeState()
109  {
110  cpr_robot::GetJointInfoResponse jointInfo=GetJointInfo();
111  m_JointName=jointInfo.JointName;
112  m_JointType=jointInfo.JointType;
113  m_Position=0.0;
114  m_Velocity=0.0;
115  }
116 
118  void JointControl::InitializeROS()
119  {
120  m_GetJointInfoClient=m_Node.serviceClient<cpr_robot::GetJointInfo>("/GetJointInfo");
121  m_JointJogPublisher=m_Node.advertise<control_msgs::JointJog>("/JointJog", 50);
122  m_JointStateSubscriber=m_Node.subscribe("/joint_states",10,&JointControl::JointStateCallback, this);
123  }
124 
127  void JointControl::JointStateCallback(const sensor_msgs::JointState::ConstPtr& msg)
128  {
129  for(size_t i=0;i<msg->name.size();i++)
130  {
131  if(msg->name[i]==m_JointName)
132  {
133  double velocity=msg->velocity[i];
134  if(velocity!=m_Velocity)
135  {
136  m_Velocity=velocity;
137  OnVelocityChanged();
138  }
139  double position=msg->position[i];
140  if(position!=m_Position)
141  {
142  m_Position=position;
143  OnPositionChanged();
144  }
145  }
146  }
147  }
148 
150  void JointControl::OnVelocitySliderValueChanged(int value)
151  {
152  control_msgs::JointJog msg;
153  msg.header.stamp=ros::Time::now();
154  msg.joint_names.push_back(m_JointName);
155  double velocity=0.01*(double)value;
156  msg.velocities.push_back(velocity);
157  m_JointJogPublisher.publish(msg);
158  }
159 
161  cpr_robot::GetJointInfoResponse JointControl::GetJointInfo()
162  {
163  cpr_robot::GetJointInfo srv;
164  srv.request.Sender="cpr_robot::JointControl";
165  srv.request.JointId=m_JointId;
166  if (m_GetJointInfoClient.call(srv))
167  {
168  ROS_INFO("GetJointInfo: %s, type %ui.",srv.response.JointName.c_str(),srv.response.JointType);
169  }
170  else
171  {
172  ROS_ERROR("Failed to call service GetJointInfo.");
173  srv.response.JointName="unknown_joint";
174  srv.response.JointType=0;
175  }
176  return srv.response;
177  }
178 }
